events.title: CompiledPoem.py: Teaching about diversity and Python through poem
events.tweet: Is it possible to learn Python programming through poetry? In this talk, you will learn how to teach conditional and looping structures in Python with diversity, for example.

events.title: FastUI - panacea or pipe dream?

events.title: Forecasting the future with EarthPT
events.tweet: EarthPT is a time series earth observation foundation model trained on TBs of satellite imagery.  It can predict future satellite observations and produces embeddings that can be used downstream.

events.title: GraalPy - Fast Python Implementation
events.tweet: GraalPy, the fast @GraalVM-based implementation of Python is ready for you! And it might just make your programs run faster or your integration with other languages leaner :)
